title: 656-C
statement: C. Without Texttime limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test64 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputYou can preview the image in better quality by the link:http://assets.codeforces.com/files/656/without-text.pngInputThe only line of the input is a string (between 1 and 50 characters long, inclusive). Each character will be an alphanumeric character or a full stop ".".OutputOutput the required answer.ExamplesInputCodeforcesOutput-87InputAPRIL.1stOutput17

processed.result:
You are given a string of alphanumeric characters and periods (".") that is between 1 and 50 characters long.  Calculate the sum of the numerical digits in the string. 

For example:

Input: "APRIL.1st"
Output: 17
Calculate the sum of the numerical digits in a given string.
